newsitem.title: USA: Parcplace says it names new CEO & CFO.
newsitem.headline: Parcplace says it names new CEO & CFO.

text.p: The board of directors of ParcPlace Digitalk Inc said Wednesday president and chief executive William Lyons resigned to pursue other interests.

The board said it had named Eugene Goda, formerly of Simulation Sciences Inc, as chief executive. In addition it said it appointed Ronald Clear, formerly of privately-held Tycom Corp as chief financial officer and James Smith as vice president of worldwide sales.
ParcPlace's former chief financial officer, Carolyn Aver, left the company for privately-held BackWeb Technologies, the companny said on April 24.
